content: space note that the ​ corner stitch counts are different repeat ​ for all sides ending with half_double_crochet chain 1 single_crochet in the top of the starting chain to join 59 half_double_crochet per side round 23 chain 2 counts as half_double_crochet half_double_crochet in ​ same space * fpdc bpdc to one stitch before corner fpdc 2 half_double_crochet chain 2 2 half_double_crochet in corner space repeat from* around ending with 2 half_double_crochet chain 1 single_crochet in the top of the starting chain to join 63 sts per side round 24 repeat round 23 67 sts per side ​ round 27 chain 2 counts as half_double_crochet half_double_crochet in ​ corner chain space *2 half_double_crochet in next st 2 half_double_crochet in round 25 repeat round 23 71 sts per side ​ eye of each st of previous row to corner skip 1 2 half_double_crochet in next st 2 half_double_crochet chain 2 2 half_double_crochet in section 4 corner space repeat from * around ending with 2 half_double_crochet in next st 2 half_double_crochet in you will turn your work after each row in this corner space chain 1 single_crochet in the top of the section starting chain to join turn 80 half_double_crochet per side ​ ​ during this row switch to a size smaller rounds 28-31 repeat last two row twice hook for the next 4 row ​ 28 40 star sts +2 double_crochet per side 29 88 half_double_crochet per side round 36 chain 5 double_crochet in chain space * work v 30 44 star sts + 2 double_crochet per side ​ stitch in chain space of shell to corner shell 31 96 half_double_crochet per side work 2 v stitches in corner shell repeat section 5 from * around ending with v_stitch in corner join with slip_stitch in 3rd chain of starting chain 36 working with the right side facing you v-sts per side round 32 chain 2 half_double_crochet in same space ​ *working in blo half_double_crochet in each stitch to rounds 37 slip_stitch into chain space chain 3 3 double_crochet in ​ corner 2hdc chain 2 2hdc in corner space chain space 3 double_crochet in space between next 2 double_crochet repeat from * around ending with 2 half_double_crochet chain 4 3 double_crochet in same space you ​ double_crochet in next chain space 3 double_crochet between next 2 double_crochet will be working between the half_double_crochet of the row ​ ​ 4 double_crochet
